column5:
A quality, 400 x 400mm, 400gsm NanoFibre cloth with NanoFibre edging, not rayon, cotton and no nasty 'edgeless' edges.
\ Perfect for use with quick detailers/spritzers such as gloss boost, to remove polish residue, with decontamination products and to remove waxes & sealants.
column8:
\

Introducing the world's best paintwork cloth, an exceptionally high quality, 400 gsm, 40 x 40cm NanoFibre™ cloth perfect for use with quick detailers/spritzers such as gloss boost, to remove polish residue, with decontamination products to remove lubricants and to buff excess waxes & sealants during application.

column1: Our NanoFibre™ Paintwork Cloth features hand-sewn pure NanoFibre™ edging, not rayon or cotton and no edge-less heat sealing.  Consisting of 80% nano polyester fibre for ultra efficient cleaning and absorption around a (20%) polyamide core, our Paintwork NanoFibre™ Cloth has superlative absorption performance with an efficient cleaning action and is very gentle on any soft high gloss suface.
- Dry to remove most waxes such as Full Metal Jacket Spray Wax
- Slightly damp with Paint Cleanse to remove polish
